page.title: 14Silton & Kepwick CE School
page.content: Silton School has a small kitchen where ovens keep warm cooked meals brought in by van.4 pupils have school meals,5 bring packed lunches and 2 go home for their meal. There are separate lavatories for boys and girls out in the yard. Each child has his own desk and pencils,books etc.are provided by the school.There is a computer,television, projector,oven,sewing machine and a tape recorder.There is a blackboard in each classroom.The school has toys and games,a good selection of books,art materials,musical instruments (including a piano) and equipment for Physical Education. Silton & Kepwick School will close in 1987 when the few remaining children will be transferred by bus to a new school(as yet unbuilt)in Knayton 4 miles away.
